question: Which state has topped in literacy rate as per a recent report by NSO?
explanation:
Recently National Statistical Office (NSO) has released a report on 'Household Social Consumption: Education in Indiaâ€™ as part of 75th round of National Sample Survey.
As per the report, Kerala ranks No.1 in literacy with 96.2% literacy rate. It is followed by Delhi with 88.7% and Uttarakhand with 87.6%. Andhra Pradesh featured at the bottom with a rate of 66.4%.
